ARABIC: إِنِّىٓ أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: I fear for you the punishment of a terrible Day.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: I fear the punishment of a terrible day for you.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: I fear for you the chastisement of an Awesome Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: I am afraid that you will suffer the torment of the Day of Judgment."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: “Indeed I fear upon you the punishment of a Great Day.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, I fear for you the torment of a Great Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Surely I fear for you the chastisement of a grievous day
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Indeed, I fear for you the chastisement of a dreadful day.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Lo! I fear for you the retribution of an awful day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: indeed, I fear for you the torment of an awful day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Verily I fear for you the torment of a Mighty Day.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Indeed I fear for you the punishment of a tremendous day.’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Truly I fear for you the Penalty of a Great Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, I fear for you the torment of a Great Day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a dreadful Day'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: I fear for you the punishment of an awesome Day.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Indeed, I fear for you the punishment of a terrible day."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:135] Indeed I fear for you the chastisement of a tremendous day’, in this world and in the Hereafter should you disobey me.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Lo! I fear for you) I know you will be visited by (the retribution of an awful day) in the Fire, if you do not repent of disbelief, idolatry and idol worship.
